title: What the heck is wrong with Joe Biden? (part 2)
title_page: Blog: What the heck is wrong with Joe Biden? (part 2)
text: See also: What the heck is wrong with Joe Biden? (part 1) Apparently there are some missing circuits in Joe Biden’s brain. Normally a garrulous fellow, Joe doesn’t respect certain taboos. In the second disturbing incident of the day yesterday, during a campaign rally, Biden pointed out the man who accompanies him carrying the nuclear codes, in case the president is disabled and the nation must retaliate. Ironically, as he exposed the man holding the nation’s most sensitive secrets to the crowd, the TV audience, and ISIS, he was trying to make the point that Donald Trump is a person too irresponsible to be entrusted with the codes he just made vulnerable to attack. Hat tip: William Levinson (Read Full Post)
